# sensitivity

## Overview

Python Sensitivity Analysis - Gradient DataFrames and Hex-Bin Plots

## Getting Started

Install `sensitivity`:

```
pip install sensitivity
```

A simple example:

```python
import sensitivity

# Do something with sensitivity
```
